name: Classic Tomato Sauce
desc: We make our signature sauce from California tomatoes ripened on the vine, then washed and packed within six hours of being picked.

name: Herbed Olive Oil (White Pizza)
desc: Our white sauce blends extra virgin olive oil with traditional Italian herbs and spices.

name: Pesto Sauce
desc: Our pesto is a creamy blend of basil leaves, olive oil and parmigiano cheese. It does not contain nuts.

name: BBQ Sauce
desc: While BBQ sauce isnt traditionally Italian, we find its bold, slightly spicy and smoky flavour pairs with our toppings in an unexpectedly complementary way.
